scenario_text.value:
Kaito, I’m telling you we can’t beat these
numbers!

Yeah, this isn’t the hill for us to die on!
We can’t handle these on our own!
QUIET!
Yeep!!!

This place... It’s crazy important to you,
ain’t it?
What?
You still good, Dracumon?!
Of course! I can keep going!

Then let’s do this! We’ll send all the
Kenzoku around here flying!

Hey... Hey, wait. This is too much, I’m
telling you...

Just stay behind me, Miu! If any of these
punks want to mess with you...

I’ll annihilate ’em! I’ll keep you alive,
Miu!

No... No, Kaito.
I don’t want you to...
Miu! Enemies... Behind us!
Huh...?
Whoa, really?! Yeeeeeek!
I don’t think so!
Wh—? Miu?!
Dracumon, can you go help Miu?!
Not yet! There’s still too many!

Damn you...damn you all!
I won’t let you get in my way!
Shit... I’m gonna fail to protect her again?!

You damn punks...
Why do you wanna hurt Miu?!
Orrryaaaaaaaaah!!!
What the—?!
Kaito! You all right?!
Takuma... Wait, so that must have been—
Tadaaah, it’s me!
Oh wow, thanks, Agumon! You’re the best!

You wanna save her, don’t you, Kaito?!
I’ll help!
...Sorry, man.
Hey, don’t sweat it.

But let’s get outta here after we take care
of the enemies, okay?
Yeah!
